title: kuzhalOshai kETka
sahitya:
kuzhalOshai kETka manam vizhaiyudaDA kOmaLa vAi maDuttu gOvindA nI Udum


anupallavi

  tazhaittOngum taru nirai brndAvanam tanil shuzhanrODum yamunaik-karai tanil nI ishaikkum


caraNam    mEni niram kaNDu mEghamena ninaindu mayilinangaL tOghai virittADumE
 kuhU kuhU enakkUvum kuyilinam tam kuralinimai marandangu kUDiDumE
 kOvalar shUzhndangu unnaik-koNDADiDa gOpiyar mei marandADip-pADiDa
 iha param tarum emmAn idO idO enru iraivan un aruginil emai azhaikkum amudak-
